name: Tailwind Theme
description: Modern design using Tailwind CSS utility classes

classes.body_classes: font-system bg-bg-gray text-text-dark leading-relaxed text-lg m-0 p-0
classes.header_classes: bg-white border-b border-border-color shadow-sm sticky top-0 z-50
classes.header_container_classes: max-w-container mx-auto px-8 py-6 flex items-center gap-12
classes.nav_link_classes: text-text-gray no-underline font-medium text-lg hover:text-primary transition-colors duration-200
classes.hero_classes: py-16 text-center bg-white my-8 rounded-2xl shadow-sm
classes.section_title_classes: text-4xl font-normal text-text-dark mb-2 flex items-center gap-4
classes.news_card_classes: bg-white rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm grid md:grid-cols-[200px_1fr] hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-200
classes.news_image_classes: news-image-text flex items-center justify-center text-white font-bold text-base tracking-wide
classes.news_image_text_classes: bg-black/50 px-4 py-2 rounded text-sm font-bold tracking-wide
classes.card_classes: bg-white rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-200
classes.card_image_classes: card-image-text h-32 flex items-center justify-center text-white font-bold text-base tracking-wide
classes.button_classes: bg-primary text-white border-none py-4 px-8 rounded-xl text-lg font-semibold cursor-pointer transition-all duration-200 mt-6 hover:bg-blue-700 hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/25
